name: Akuma Dollz
disclosureNotes: Spotify bio states: "The Akuma DollZ are not a real band â€” they are fictional characters I created as the visual and creative spirit of this project. The music itself still starts entirely with me: I write the lyrics, compose the melodies, record guitar ideas, and build a full arrangement using virtual instruments. These demos are strict, detailed blueprints that define the structure, harmonies, riffs, vocal parts, and transitions."
